content: Don't buy it, devs have abandoned it and hasn't even updated in a year. Needs an update bad too.

Ya this is a nice app. It's not updated to the new 1.5 version though. Also, feedback for the dev, could you put in the settings for your farm that you've chosen 25% profits? That would make planning a little easier :)
So far the app has been really helpful, but I would wish for an update to match the new update on the game. so far there's been a ton on new crops added, that I wish were logged into this app.
It was good while it lasted but this app is probably dead now since it hasn't been updated in a very long time, tried to contact the dev but also never received any more reply.
replyContent:
Thank you very much for the great review!
The idea of swiping the calendar is very interesting, I will try to implementing for the next version. I didn't knew about the minimizing problem, It's definitely a bug so I will fix it as soon as possible.
Edit:
I fixed the calendar bug and added the feature. It will be available for the next update.

content: Really nice app. Sadly the gift pages are not finished. For me that was the most important part.
it's a good start but, I'm a check with fanatic. And the only check list is the bundles. Although I like the information. I don't think you have everything.
It was good for a while but the lack of updates have left this app woth alot of inaccuracies. Ill give a better rating when you guys decide you want to update the app more frequently.
Well organized and easy to use. You can even create multiple save files in the app so you can switch between each farm you've created and track your individual progress on each.
I tried using the app for something i needed to know about but it sadly closed the app
wonderful guide! its nice to have an app like the wiki but is a lot easier to navigate quickly

Great app and seems to contain everything useful. One thing I would like to see changed though; the fish section should be sorted by season and location should be shown in the column to the right, not the other way around. EDIT: A lot of the fish are missing, amongst them everything you can catch in crab pots, which is a shame since they count in the fish tab.
Missing a lot of info. No info on animal produce, Artisan goods, or weapons. Second year and after show events that only happen in first year(like access to the mines).

okay but there are lots of bugs and some crops have wrong info (like rubarbs takes 13 days to grow but it says in the app it's only 6 days) im still givingn it a chance tho bc it seems like it has lots of potentials
It would be good if it had massive updates But it's not informative and hard to use
Still a LOT of items that need ''implemented''
replyContent: Thank you for the review! I am periodically adding new item information with updates. You can check which item types there are in the main page.

content: Liked the app. Add crafting items to this app please. I know it might take time to add everything the official wiki has into the app. But for anything that's on the app - please redirect to the wiki page when clicked on the particular item.
replyContent: Thats a good idea! I will look more into this and try to implement it.

content: The app is good for keeping track of minerals, fish, and bundles. It is also helpful in locating villagers. However, a lot of items have no data or show very little data about how to obtain the items. It wasn't as helpful as I was expecting, so I refunded the app. If you are just starting out in SV, this app may be of more benefit to you than it was to me.
Please add either a warning when adding crops that dont have time to grow due to season changes, or a "last chance to plant" entry in the calendar üëç
Not accurate
replyContent: Thanks for the review! I know that everything is not 100% accurate because since I launched the app the game has received updates. I would appreciate a lot if you could send me an email with some examples of inaccuracy so I can fix them.

content: Great app, but please add a dark mode!

This guide literally has almost everything. I'd love if you added a crafting center/when you are able to craft certain items. It would help me plan out my farm better. Also I don't know if it's a bug or not, but I cannot seem to remove planned crops so I can change them for the next year and some crops like the radish have wrong growing times.
replyContent:
Thank you for the review!
Adding crafting items is one of my priorities right now. You can remove a planned crop by swiping it to the left or right. I will check the growing time problem, thank you for noticing me about it.

content: Has a really good user interface and tells you everything you need to know with in tap. If anything could be added it would be to add a planner or to do list Bit it's a great app
replyContent:
Thank you for the review!
You can add custom to-dos in the "Calendar", there you can also plan crops.

content: Love this guide it is the most useful and up to date app for Stardew Valley the video gameüòâüòâüòéü•≥
replyContent: Thank you very much!

content: Awesome app. Looks amazing. Could you please add a check list for the Artifacts and Minerals for the museum please. I think that would really complete it <3
replyContent: Thank you for the review! I know it's not exactly what you are asking but you can set a mineral or artifact as completed with the button check button on the information page.

content: Love the app the the UI, just missing some information that would make it perfect, like prices on animal products (eggs,milk ect) and artisan products, once there definitely a 5 stat!!
replyContent: I'm adding those for the next update, stay tuned!

content: It's a nice app with a sleek design, but some of the information is simply outdated or missing. Can't recommend spending money on it in the current state.

There are a lot of great features in this app, but a few things missing to really make it 5 star. Small stuff like inconsistent alphabetized lists and repeated events in the wrong year are a nuisance, but other apps have features that I'd like to see here. Such as summarizing most profitable crops and if you can't get them until a certain year or event, as well as the ability to make notes/to do's repeatable. What I'd like to see added the most is event descriptions with times, locations, etc.

I absolutely love the UI. But there's strangely some information missing or inconsistent. My ideal use case of this app is to search an item and immediately see which NPCs will like/love. In the app, this works for some items/NPCs but not all. Will keep installed though as this app has not been abandoned.
I think it's a really good app!! Although, I'm pretty sure Abigail likes quartz :O but it in the app says otherwise.
Everything is superb, couple of items missing, would be 5 stats if it had a night mode pls add night mode

Great app! The clean menu system and UI is the reason I bought this guide, job well done. I would like to see what food people dislike and maybe a marriage tab added to characters describing what they bring to a marriage. Keep up the good work and thank you!
I love the app but a building checklist with the cost would be nice

Seems great for the most part. I love the crop calendar. I do wish that it took fertilizer into consideration, though. Otherwise, it looks nice, feels nice, and is incredibly useful to make your life in Stardew a bit easier.
Awesome
replyContent: Thank you!!

content: Amazing, but I will ask for crafting recipes. Otherwise, exactly what I wanted for a good price.
replyContent:
Thank you very much!
I have planned to release crafting recipes in a few weeks.

content: Amazing app. One change I would make is to add the rewards you get for the bundles so users can prioritize without using another app or having to Google it.
replyContent:
Thank you very much for the review!
You can do this by tapping the prize icon at the upper bar.

content: It's ok. It has its uses tracking crops etc but the amount of times I still have to head to Google instead is pretty bad for a paid for app. If it was free OR it was a more complete package, I'd recommend it, but as it is, I don't.
replyContent: Thank you for the review. I'm working on adding more content and information but it's impossible for me to include everything the game or the wiki has and keep a clean design, I hope you can ubderstand. By the way, if you want a refund or you want to request a feature you can contact me via email.

content: Thanks this is really helpful you did one amazing Job! Also i wanted the know do this app work when i have my wife offline? If not please make available q
replyContent:
Thank you very much for the review!
The app works perfectly without wifi/data except the music player which requires a connection.

content: so correction it seems that all the fish pricing is off
replyContent: That's a bug, I hope I can fix it today

content: It was no help what so ever
replyContent: Hi, I'm sorry you didn't like the app. Could you explain what should I improve?  If you want a refund you can send me an email :)

content: Great app that is still being expanded. However, as of the recent update it seems I can no longer filter the lists of fish, recipes so I can only see the items I dont have. Now it forces me to hunt through the entire list to see which I have and dont have. I'm not sure if this is a glitch but I miss that feature and wish it'd come back.
replyContent: Thank you for the review! That's a bug, I will fix it today. Google takes a day to publish it so I hope it will be available for tomorrow.

content: Great app especially to track your bundles for the community centre, would be great if the heart events for each villager was on there so we knew how and where to trigger them without having to search online.
Love this so far. One question: can we set someone as our spouse so we can locate them accurately, etc.?
replyContent: Thank you very much for the review. I will try to add a way to locate married villagers but, generally they only change schedules on mondays.

content: Very handy! I'm using it while playing on the Switch.
replyContent: Than you very much for the review Chris!

content: Love this app but would love it more if it had all the buildings and that for your farm and what you needed for them to make it.
replyContent: Thank you for the review! Farm buildings are a planned feature. If you have more ideas you can send them to my email.

content: So I've been searching for the best planning/tracking app to be my companion guide for my newest playthrough of Stardew, and believe me when I say I went through a few apps trying to find the perfect one. Guys, this IS that app. I've been using it for several weeks now, and I only find myself retreating to the wikia for building requirements and miscellaneous item info. This extensive app and its devoted developer are an absolute gem! I eagerly await updates, keep up the incredible work :D
replyContent:
Thank you very very much. You are so kind and I hope you will like the future updates I'm developing, the buildings will be implemented soon. Best wishes for you! :)

- Markel

content: Great app and resource. Could definitely do with more updates, first I'd recommend a general app-wide search function. Keep up the great work, glad to have purchased! üëç
replyContent: Thank you for the review! I was implementing the app-wide search function few hours ago! It will be available for the next update.

content: This app is truly a great help! However, I would really like to have the option to see the npc's location when I open their information screen. Rather than using the npc locator, it takes too much time for me
replyContent:
Thanks for the review!
I will add a shortcut from every villager info page to go directly to the locator and select the villager automatically. Also I'm planning on making the villager locator easier to use.

content: One of the best underrated trackers/guides you can get on the playstore! The dev is also quick at responding to problems and excecuting new updates. There is even a music player that is unseen in most of related apps. For its price tag, you won't get anything better than this!
replyContent:
Thanks for the review!
I will try to implement the multiple farm system, it will be a bit complicated because the app is programmed just for 1 farm. I will try anyway :)
Edit: I just added the multi-farm system! Update the app to try it.

content: This is exactly what I needed! It covers all the basic stuff like community bundles and gifting. But most importantly it lets you set date, time, whether the community center is done, and the weather to to help you find the NPC of your choice. No more scanning the wiki because you forgot Sebastian's birthday and for once he's not in his room.
replyContent: Thank you very much for the great review! I'm very happy that you liked it!

content: Lots of information on most things. I love the calendar aspect that lets you know when certain things are happening, which if you are playing for the first time would not know where or even if they existed. I would give a full 5 stars if I had access to what items the villagers, not only loved/best gifts, but if I knew what they liked/neutral/disliked/hated, if I can't give them the best gift. I've seen this aspect in some other free apps and it's really the only thing I'm missing from this one.
replyContent:
Thank you for the review!
I'm working right now on adding the liked gifts! It will be available soon.
Edit: Liked items are available in the latest update :)

content: Officially Best App Available ‚ô°‚ô°
replyContent:
Thank you for the review!
I will add the crop check feature for the next update :)
Edit: Added!

content: Nice app. Easy and convenient. Missing some components that I would really like to see implemented. I love to forage and would like to see it in the app. Edit: My 3‚òÜ review is based on the current status of the app. Given how old the game is, that the app costs money and that it is missing vital information, my rating feels justified. I reserve the right to change it once more features and information are added.
replyContent:
I'm working to add more items. Foraging is coming soon :)
Edit: okay, thank you for the explanation, but keep in mind that the app will never be as complete as the wiki.

content: Pretty good app, would be 5 stars if it had what the villagers liked not just loved. Also a gem tracker since you can track artifacts. Last thing, if it had villager tracker for rainy days. Unfortunately still find myself going to the wiki too frequently to make this purchase worth it. Edit: Having read other reviews and dev responses, I realized this is a brand new app, in which case, it is very well done. I look forward to updates! Keep up the good work!
replyContent:
Thank you very much! I'm waiting 3 days for google to upload the new update which includes the gem tracker and many more features. You can select if it's raining in the locator (There is a switch below the villager)
Edit: I just published the update with the gem tracker
Edit 2: You can see the liked items of each villager in the latest update.

content: Nice guide and info for SV.. But can u update for Material Item in SV like Gold Bar ?? I hope for next update...
replyContent:
Thank you very much for 5 stars!
I will add the resource items (gold, iron, wood...) for the following or the next update :)

content: i love the guide so far, very helpful. i've run into an issue with the "NPC locator" causing the app to constantly crash whenever i tap on the option. A feature i would love to see in the future is an option to track artisan goods put in either casks or kegs and preserve jars to the calander for those of us who keep forgetting when and forget to check (myself included). also could you please add the "Wild Seed" packs to the crop planted section of the calander? thanks and keep up the great work
replyContent:
Thanks for the review! I'm waiting to Play Store to accept the update that fixes all the locator crashes. The cask and kegs feature is a really good idea and I will try to implement it. Thank you very much for these ideas!
Edit: I added wild seeds to the calendar and fixed the crash in the latest update!

content: I buy and install this app, but i cant open the NPC locator. how to fix it
replyContent:
That's weird, try removing the data of the app (Settings/Apps/StardewGuide/Storage/Clear data) and then open it again. If the problems is not fixed update the app when the new version comes today. You can also contact me via email.
Edit: It's fixed in the new update (1.3)

content: I really really love this app, I have tried all the stardew Valley ones on Android and this is by far the best.
replyContent: Thank you very much for reviewing!

content: good app - wish if I clicked on crops I could see who (if anyone) they're good gifts for, also an option to click on forageable items in the same way as crops. also Emily is listed as Alex's Grandmother üòÖ edit: trying to open Dwarf scroll 3 crashes the app also if Gems could be ticked off like artifacts once they're in the museum it would be insanely helpful üôè
replyContent: Check out the new update, I fixed those 2 problems. Also I will add gems with the ticking feature for the next update :)

content: Great, full guide. The only one I've seen so far on the play store that's not just a bundle tracker. And only 100+ downloads? Worth the $1 do not have to constantly google "stardew valley..." every 2 minutes.
replyContent: Thank you very much! I'm so amazed by the fact that my app has +100 downloads already, for me It's a lot!

content: Very well done app. I love the map locator it has proven very useful. However it doesn't have the full list of items Liked/Neutral/Dislikes/Hates for all of the Characters.
amazingand the offline functionality is great. I would suggest adding which crops would be the most profitable for the season.
replyContent: Thank you very much for reviewing, I will try to add the most profitable crop feature for the next update.

content: Very detailed guide, and is the only one I have found that can tell you the uses of an item so you can quickly tell if its needed in a bundle, recipe, or gift for a friend. Almost earned 5 stars accept some items are not yet implemented (as in they dont have the uses menu) and it could really use a filter on the menus to shortcut to Summer / Fall / Forageabe / Lake / Ocean etc
replyContent:
Thanks for the good review!
The filter feature will be added in the 1.2 update and also I will add all the information about cooking recipes and minerals. Other items are coming soon (animal products, artisan goods...)

content: it barely worked on my phone, i wish i could get my money back :/ its not a bad app, but i couldn't get it to work without glitching or freezing. maybe its my phone though. either way devs did good, theres lots of useful information
replyContent: Thanks for reviewing, you can refund your money if the app doesn't work. Anyways, your phone (Galaxy J7) is a pretty old phone with only 1.5gb of ram. I suggest you to upgrade your phone or reset it to factory settings. I tested the app in my 4 year old phone and I couldn't see any big freezes. Could you tell me on which part of the app it freezes?

content: It kinda sucks how some info just takes me to the wiki, which I could have done for free, instead of having it all on the app. I got it so I wouldn't need internet to look up things. It also crashes when I try to use the locator.
replyContent:
Thanks for reviewing, the app doesn't take you to the wiki, it stores data from the game files and then it displays in a readable way. I'm really sorry for the crashes, I would greatly appreciate if you could tell me which villager are you trying to locate when the crash occurs.
Edit:
I added an update that fixes the crash you mentioned

content: this app is my best friend when playing stardew valley. i deleted my previous 2 stardew apps as this one covers a lot of game content. perhaps a show/hide function for collected items would be nice, or some form of marking on the list to show it has been collected. i can't wait for future updates and additions - there is so much potential!
replyContent:
Thank you so much for the review!
I will try to implement the feature you said for the next version.

Edit:
A new update with the feature you requested has been sent :)

content: This is actually amazing. It includes everything I've been looking for. The developer was swift with a response to correct an issue I was having. P.S. The Music player is actually the best and I can't wait to see further updates and more implemented into this app!!
replyContent:
Thanks for reviewing!
You can remove a planned crop simply by swiping it.
